page.syntax: Word_Number as N = WORD_FROM_POS(C text,N pos,[,C separator])

argument.name: pos
argument.description: A character position within the Input_String. Numeric

argument.name: separator
argument.description: Optional. Default = space (" "). The character string that separates words.

page.description: Given a character position, return the 'word' that character is in.
page.discussion: Converts the position in a text string to the number of the word in the text string. If Position, pos, occurs on a separator, Word_Number is 0.
